document.full_text: jordanian police used tear gas on friday to stop fighting after pro-monarchy youths threw stones at a group of salafis, ultra-conservative sunni muslims, demanding freedom for detainees in zarqa city, witnesses said.
document.title: jordan police fire tear gas to stop clash, 20 hurt
lines_and_colors: jordanian police used tear gas on friday to stop fighting after pro-monarchy youths threw stones at a group of salafis, ultra-conservative sunni muslims, demanding freedom for detainees in zarqa city, witnesses said.
